com.konakart.al

Class QuotaMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.al.BaseMgr
      • com.konakart.al.QuotaMgr

  • public class QuotaMgr
extends BaseMgr
    Manager for managing customer quotas. A quota may be set for a product so that a customer cannot buy more than x many products in a certain time frame or within a single purchase etc.
    This manager can be customized to add quota management logic pertinent to your business.
